XXbsa066_u:12: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato
XXbsa066_u:14: śāstrārthakathanakālopasthitaparasaṃbhāvyamānānupanyāsahetunirākaraṇārthaṃ ca nyāyapraveśakākhyaṃ śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ-
XXbsa066_u:17: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat
XXbsa066_u:19: / ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena /
XXbsa066_u:20: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ // vyākhyā ca padavākyasaṃgateti /
XXbsa066_u:23: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ //
XXbsa066_u:26: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni //
XXbsa066_u:28: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam /
XXbsa066_u:40: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:52: vakṣyati ca abhūtasādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇābhāsānīti // parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:53: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya /
XXbsa066_u:57: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne /
XXbsa066_u:59: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko 'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti // pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati
XXbsa066_u:61: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi /
XXbsa066_u:62: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:72: sa cāvadhāraṇa iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ // ātmasaṃvide iti /
XXbsa066_u:77: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā /
XXbsa066_u:80: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ /
XXbsa066_u:82: tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti
XXbsa066_u:113: / idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam /
XXbsa066_u:132: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha //
XXbsa066_u:135: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti /
XXbsa066_u:137: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti /
XXbsa066_u:138: gomaṇḍalādiva gauḥ kṣīrasaṃpannatvena guṇena // pacyate iti pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:156: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti /
XXbsa066_u:160: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti /
XXbsa066_u:161: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ // te ca pakṣopalakṣitā
XXbsa066_u:164: iha ca yadā sādhyate 'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam /
XXbsa066_u:166: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam /
XXbsa066_u:170: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti /
XXbsa066_u:176: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:179: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam /
XXbsa066_u:206: / ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto 'rtha iti /
XXbsa066_u:211: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate
XXbsa066_u:217: vyatireke bījādi // tatra pakṣādivacanāni sādhanam ityuiktam // adhunā yathoddeśaṃ nirdeśa
XXbsa066_u:225: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste 'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ /
XXbsa066_u:234: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate /
XXbsa066_u:239: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau
XXbsa066_u:245: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:246: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:247: prasiddhaviśepaṇaviśiṣṭayetyanena tvaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya ubhayena cāprasiddhobhayasya svayamityanena cābhyupagamasiddhāntaparigraheṇa sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇasiddhāntānāṃ vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ iha tu śastranirapekṣavādinorlokaprasiddhayordharmadharmiṇoḥ parigrahavacanamabhyupagamasiddhāntastaṃ svayamityanenāha /
XXbsa066_u:249: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame
XXbsa066_u:250: yastadānena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti yaduktaṃ vādimukhyena tadapi saṃgatameva /
XXbsa066_u:256: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati /
XXbsa066_u:257: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ //
XXbsa066_u:258: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha /
XXbsa066_u:271: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:272: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam /
XXbsa066_u:276: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva
XXbsa066_u:294: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati // sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ
XXbsa066_u:296: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti /
XXbsa066_u:316: dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmīti bhāvārthaḥ // sāṃprataṃ sapakṣasyaiva udāharaṇamupadarśayannāha
XXbsa066_u:329: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate /
XXbsa066_u:339: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:341: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
XXbsa066_u:345: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:353: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:357: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:358: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ
XXbsa066_u:360: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe 'pyabhāvāt
XXbsa066_u:365: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham? /
XXbsa066_u:369: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi /
XXbsa066_u:379: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam /
XXbsa066_u:381: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena /
XXbsa066_u:382: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena /
XXbsa066_u:388: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena /
XXbsa066_u:390: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam /
XXbsa066_u:428: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam /
XXbsa066_u:440: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:456: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt /
XXbsa066_u:465: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ
XXbsa066_u:467: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ? iti /
XXbsa066_u:470: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate /
XXbsa066_u:478: anityo ghaṭaḥ kāraṇādhīnātmalābhatvāt pradipavat // āgamaviruddho yathā /
XXbsa066_u:480: vaiśeṣiko 'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ
XXbsa066_u:482: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi // lokaviruddho yathā /
XXbsa066_u:486: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti /
XXbsa066_u:494: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate /
XXbsa066_u:495: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā /
XXbsa066_u:496: tataśca yadi mātā kathaṃ vandhyā? vandhyā cetkathaṃ māteti? // tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇo yathā
XXbsa066_u:497: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti /
XXbsa066_u:504: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:518: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti /
XXbsa066_u:521: // tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti /
XXbsa066_u:525: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:541: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
XXbsa066_u:543: ākṣepaparihārau pūrvavat // tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti /
XXbsa066_u:544: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ
XXbsa066_u:555: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:566: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ
XXbsa066_u:580: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:586: ubhayorvādiprativādinoḥ asiddha ubhayāsiddhaḥ // anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ // saṃdihyate sa saṃdigdhaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:594: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi /
XXbsa066_u:597: tathāhi- cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:600: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ
XXbsa066_u:601: tathāhi- na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti // tathā bāṣpādibhāvenetyādi
XXbsa066_u:602: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena
XXbsa066_u:603: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:608: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti /
XXbsa066_u:614: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti //
XXbsa066_u:619: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram
XXbsa066_u:621: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti /
XXbsa066_u:622: nanu cānyo 'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā /
XXbsa066_u:646: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ // bhedānevāha /
XXbsa066_u:652: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:653: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt
XXbsa066_u:660: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau /
XXbsa066_u:665: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati /
XXbsa066_u:678: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ
XXbsa066_u:684: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam /
XXbsa066_u:692: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā /
XXbsa066_u:699: yadi tadanyatra nitye vānitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā /
XXbsa066_u:706: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ
XXbsa066_u:707: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī /
XXbsa066_u:742: yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvāditi // nityaḥ pakṣo 'syākāśaparamāṇvādiḥ sapakṣaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:752: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:754: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate /
XXbsa066_u:762: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha /
XXbsa066_u:764: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti /
XXbsa066_u:766: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā /
XXbsa066_u:767: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti /
XXbsa066_u:768: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ
XXbsa066_u:780: sa cānenāṃśenācāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:790: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ
XXbsa066_u:798: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:801: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ
XXbsa066_u:807: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti? /
XXbsa066_u:818: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti /
XXbsa066_u:827: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt /
XXbsa066_u:832: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo 'pīti bhāvārthaḥ
XXbsa066_u:835: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati /
XXbsa066_u:839: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:840: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi
XXbsa066_u:841: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya /
XXbsa066_u:843: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ
XXbsa066_u:846: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt /
XXbsa066_u:857: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi /
XXbsa066_u:859: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ /
XXbsa066_u:860: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti /
XXbsa066_u:866: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate /
XXbsa066_u:875: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān
XXbsa066_u:879: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam /
XXbsa066_u:884: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti /
XXbsa066_u:887: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ
XXbsa066_u:889: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat
XXbsa066_u:892: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo 'pītyabhiprāyaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:893: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathāpi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha
XXbsa066_u:895: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:896: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām /
XXbsa066_u:899: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:900: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām /
XXbsa066_u:905: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro 'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvatvamapi
XXbsa066_u:912: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:914: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:915: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:917: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat /
XXbsa066_u:920: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ? /
XXbsa066_u:922: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām /
XXbsa066_u:932: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā
XXbsa066_u:938: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā /
XXbsa066_u:940: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati /
XXbsa066_u:942: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat
XXbsa066_u:951: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso 'pi tathā /
XXbsa066_u:958: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā /
XXbsa066_u:963: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvāsiddhasādhanadharmā iti /
XXbsa066_u:966: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate
XXbsa066_u:970: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate /
XXbsa066_u:977: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam
XXbsa066_u:988: mūrtatvaṃ ca mūrtimatkāryaghaṭādyupalabdheḥ siddhamiti // sādhyadharmāsiddho yathā /
XXbsa066_u:991: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
XXbsa066_u:992: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti
XXbsa066_u:995: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ /
XXbsa066_u:1011: 'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo 'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo 'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti /
XXbsa066_u:1038: / yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
XXbsa066_u:1045: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam
XXbsa066_u:1059: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eva // tatra sādhyāvyāvṛttaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'mūrtatvātparamāṇuvat
XXbsa066_u:1080: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate?
XXbsa066_u:1083: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti /
XXbsa066_u:1104: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā /
XXbsa066_u:1108: yathā ghaṭe 'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti /
XXbsa066_u:1110: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ /
XXbsa066_u:1113: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti /
XXbsa066_u:1118: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti
XXbsa066_u:1128: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe /
XXbsa066_u:1135: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne /
XXbsa066_u:1146: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham /
XXbsa066_u:1153: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye /
XXbsa066_u:1157: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam
XXbsa066_u:1168: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te 'pi pratibhāserannityādi
XXbsa066_u:1174: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti? /
XXbsa066_u:1180: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
XXbsa066_u:1184: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya
XXbsa066_u:1195: 'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānamutpadyate kiṃviśiṣṭam? agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti /
XXbsa066_u:1215: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram
XXbsa066_u:1222: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti
XXbsa066_u:1223: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate /
XXbsa066_u:1229: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate /
XXbsa066_u:1238: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena /
XXbsa066_u:1240: dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam
XXbsa066_u:1255: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tudbhāvanamātrameva /
XXbsa066_u:1259: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni
